name: Unifinished unpolished Bull-themed game where you enact your revenge against a thief that dared to slight you.
name_original: Unifinished unpolished Bull-themed game where you enact your revenge against a thief that dared to slight you.
description:
TAKE YOUR REVENGE, DESTROY THE STORE, FIND YOUR RING, AND ESCAPE THROUGH THE WINDOW DOOR!

A short game about revenge, destruction, and how the lack of empathy in a cold world can damage one's perception of life.

ATTENTION:

This game uses A LOT of rigid bodies, and computers DO NOT like running it. I still think it's fun.

NOTES:

Apologies for the lack of accessibility options. I definitely overscoped on this one!

CREDITS:

"Tale of Tsar Saltan - Flight of the Bumblebee" by US Army Band from musopen, no changes made.

"Cello Suite no. 1 - Prelude in G, BWV 1007" by Accou from musopen, no changes made.
